doc.title: Dottaaɗe aduna
doc.excludeDomains: Ɓeydu inɗe domen ngam ittude Ko innde domen wootere tan waawi ɓeydeede e sahaa gooto.

example.domain: Aɗa waawi ɓeydude innde domen, hono {{url}}, ngam ittude innde domen ndee fof.
example.url: Aɗa waawi ittude jokkorɗe keertiiɗe so a ɓeydii heen jokkorde, hono {{url}}.
example.glob: Aɗa waawi ɓeydude heen mbaydi {{glob}}, hono <kode>{{jokkondire tokoose}}</kode>, ngam jokkondire ɓuuɓɗe.

doc.script: Aɗa waawi kadi huutoraade binndanɗe js ngam heɓde ƴeewndo ɓurngo softude.
doc.checkedUseScript: So tawii ko ngam softinde binndol maa, tesko wonde aɗa foti ƴeewtaade kaayitaaji ɗiɗi ɗii fof e sahaa gooto ngam softinde binndol ngol.

example1.commentTitle: Jooni e lowre {{youtube}}, aɗa foti udditde hello {{watch}} maa {{shorts}} {{youtube}} e nder tablo keso.
example1.page: : Waɗde ko huunde URL hello web jooni ngoo Ngam humpitaade, <a href='blank' rel='noreferrer'> Tiiɗno ƴeew</a >
example1.pageHost: : Innde domen hello web jooni ngoo
example1.isSameSubDomain: {{isSameSubDomain}}: Innde domen wootere Tesko-ɗen wonde hay so tawii inɗe domen mawɗe {{youtube}} e {{galleeji}} fof ko {{DomenMawɗo}}, inɗe domen tokoose ɗee ko {{DomenLowreYoutube}} e {{. familiesSubDomain}} ko noon inɗe domen maɓɓe ceertiri.
example1.minimatch: : feere kawral {{glob}}, kuutortooɗo defterdu {{minimatch}}, feere kuutoragol Eɗen ñaagii Ƴeew, walla aɗa waawi yiylaade no {{glob}} huutortee.
example1.rightTab: : Jokkorde ndee uddittee ko e lowre hesere to bannge ñaamo
example1.wholeCode: Maanaa kod oo fof ko jooni e hello innde domen YouTube {{www}}, so tawii jokkorde nde ɓuuɓnaa ndee ko innde domen wootere, laawol ngol fuɗɗotoo ko e {{watch}} walla {{shorts}}, ndeen tab keso oo hello to bannge ñaamo maa won Uddit.
